it.azraelsec.Chat

Class MessageReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • it.azraelsec.Chat.MessageReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MessageReceiver
extends java.lang.Thread
    The MessageReceiver class represent a ChatMessage receiver which waits for new messages addressed to him and stores them in a List.

    The Client will then have the possibility to asyncronously withdraw them all.

    This Thread spawn a DatagramChannel which acts like a UDP Server which waits for new multicast messages sent from other Client processes around the network.

    Author:
    Federico Gerardi, https://azraelsec.github.io/
